questions.question: What is the purpose of CSS?
options: To style and layout web pages

questions.question: What is a CSS selector?
options: Pattern used to select elements to style

questions.question: What is Flexbox?
options: Layout method for arranging items in container

questions.question: What is a media query?
options: CSS feature for responsive design based on screen size

questions.question: What is responsive design?
options: Design that adapts to different screen sizes

questions.question: What is a CSS variable?
options: Custom property that stores value for reuse

questions.question: What is specificity in CSS?
options: Rule that determines which style applies when multiple rules match

questions.question: What is a pseudo-class?
options: Keyword added to selector to style element in specific state

questions.question: What is a pseudo-element?
options: Keyword for styling specific parts of element

questions.question: What is a CSS framework?
options: Pre-written CSS library for faster development

questions.question: What is inline CSS?
options: CSS written directly in HTML element

questions.question: What is internal CSS?
options: CSS in <style> tag in HTML head

questions.question: What is external CSS?
options: CSS in separate file linked to HTML

questions.question: What is z-index?
options: Property that controls stacking order of elements

questions.question: What is CSS reset?
options: Removing browser default styles for consistency

questions.question: What is the cascade in CSS?
options: Order of priority when multiple styles apply
